Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • Square

  • public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    Square class is 1 of 25 tiles in Froggy game map Each tile is a JButton, displaying an image which has also a description. Description is not displayed but is used to analyze what is shown on a tile. Square also holds its own x and y coordinate which can be from 0 to 4

    • Constructor Summary

      Square constructor

      getY method
      Square moveTo(Square where)
      moveTo method takes JButton where if "where" is empty (no frog is in it) moveTo method changes where to currently clicked Square if "where" contains different Square with frog moveTo method first checks if wanted jump to perform is valid, if so change this Square to frog from "where" if not unclick the "where" Square
      void setDescription(int description)
      setDescription method used to change Square's image description
      void setSquare(int in)
      setSquare method used to change image and its description of a Square
      void setX(int xv)
      setX method used to change x coordinate of this Square
      void setY(int yv)
      setY method used to change y coordinate of this Square
      boolean validMove(Square where)
      validMove method used to check if frog is not trying to jump on water or on another frog checks if jump is of valid length and direction

    • Constructor Detail

      • Square

        public Square(int in,
              int xv,
              int yv)
        Square constructor
        Parameters:
        in - image id from 0 to 5 which should be displayed 0 creates water tile 1 creates pad tile 2 creates greenFrog tile 3 creates redFrog tile 4 creates yellowGreenFrog tile 5 creates yellowRedFrog tile
        xv - x coordinate on 5x5 map
        yv - y coordinate on 5x5 map

      • getDescription

        public int getDescription()
        getDescription method
        Returns:

        public void setDescription(int description)
        setDescription method used to change Square's image description

      • setSquare

        public void setSquare(int in)
        setSquare method used to change image and its description of a Square
        Parameters:
        in - not negative integer lower than 6 which indicates what will be displayed

      • validMove

        public boolean validMove(Square where)
        validMove method used to check if frog is not trying to jump on water or on another frog checks if jump is of valid length and direction
        Parameters:
        where - Square from which frog is trying to jump
        Returns:
        jump is valid then true else return false

      • moveTo

        public Square moveTo(Square where)
        moveTo method takes JButton where if "where" is empty (no frog is in it) moveTo method changes where to currently clicked Square if "where" contains different Square with frog moveTo method first checks if wanted jump to perform is valid, if so change this Square to frog from "where" if not unclick the "where" Square
        Parameters:
        where - Square from which we are jumping to this Square
        Returns:
        changed where Square
